Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Westbound Reroute near Foster/Cicero
ShortDescription: Westbound 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Cicero, Elston and Foster: due to street blockage near Foster/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Cicero, Elston and Foster: due to street blockage near Foster/Cicero.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute near 79th/East End
ShortDescription:
79 79th buses rerouted: 
WB buses via 79th, Jeffery, 75th, Cottage Grove, 79th reg. route. 
EB buses via 79th, Stony Island, 75th, Jeffery, 79th reg. route.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near 79th/East End.

Westbound buses will operate via 79th, Jeffery, 75th, Cottage Grove, 79th, and resume normal route.

Eastbound buses will operate via 79th, Stony Island, 75th, Jeffery, 79th, and resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park Blue Line Service Delayed at Addison
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Addison due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Addison due to a mechanical problem. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
